name: Authentication
description: Use the AWS::CloudFormation::Authentication resource to specify authentication credentials for files or sources that you specify with the AWS::CloudFormation::Init resource.

properties.name: accessKeyId
properties.description: Specifies the access key ID for S3 authentication.

properties.name: buckets
properties.description: A comma-delimited list of Amazon S3 buckets to be associated with the S3 authentication credentials.

properties.name: password
properties.description: Specifies the password for basic authentication.

properties.name: secretKey
properties.description: Specifies the secret key for S3 authentication.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Specifies whether the authentication scheme uses a user name and password ("basic") or an access key ID and secret key ("S3").

properties.name: uris
properties.description: A comma-delimited list of URIs to be associated with the basic authentication credentials. The authorization applies to the specified URIs and any more specific URI. For example, if you specify http://www.example.com, the authorization will also apply to http://www.example.com/test.

properties.name: username
properties.description: Specifies the user name for basic authentication.

properties.name: roleName
properties.description: Describes the role for role-based authentication.
